name: Electromedia
description:
Over the years Electromedia has built a strong reputation in the North West as being a company to trust. Since our launch we have grown to become one of the most established and experienced production companies in the UK specialising in digital media production and interactive media services. The majority of the projects we work on are from recommendations which illustrates the excellent relationships we have built up with clients across all sectors.
Many of our new clients come to us seeking video production services have done so through word of mouth recommendations and we have secured a substantial amount of repeat business achieved through our first class customer care and comprehensive portfolio of services. We have had many clients approach us for a video production and then progressed on to a full branding package, website design and app development as well as the management of their print and graphic design requirements. The range of our skills means that we can offer a comprehensive package of services and can take care of everything which will be managed by our skilled and professional team.
